violations.description: No try-catch block found. Promise rejection with FetchError (error.type='system', error.code like ENOTFOUND, ECONNREFUSED, ETIMEDOUT) - this will crash the application.
violations.suggested_fix: Caller MUST use try-catch to handle Promise rejections from fetch(). Network-level failures (DNS errors, connection refused, timeouts) reject the Promise. CRITICAL: fetch() does NOT reject on HTTP 4xx/5xx status codes - those are successful responses that must be checked with response.ok. Recommended pattern: try { const res = await fetch(url); if (!res.ok) throw new Error(`HTTP ${res.status}`); } catch (error) { /* handle network errors */ }
